DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective determine absorption profile sugar-based beverage inflammatory mechanism time beverage consumption relative meal intake . Secondary objective determine absorption profile sugar-based beverage oxidative metabolic mechanism time beverage consumption relative meal intake . The result serve internal reference negative control group compare polyphenol contain study study . Each subject receive 3 identical placebo drink time point : fasting ( 0h ) , standardize breakfast meal ( 2h ) , 2 hour breakfast meal ( 4h ) . A planned size 12 recruit part study . This study single-arm design utilize multiple sampling , repeat measure paradigm evaluate time influence consumption sugar-based beverage associate acute effect inflammatory marker .
DOC.detailed_description: A planned sample size 12 recruit study . This study require one initial screen visit , one pre-study visit , 1 study visit . The study take 1-2 week per subject complete . The initial screening visit provide subject inform consent document determine subject eligibility height weight measurement , vital sign , blood glucose test ( finger prick ) , completion survey relate general eating , health , exercise habit . If willing eligible participate , 3-day food record ( 2 weekday 1 weekend day ) instruct initial screen visit collect pre-study visit ass subject ' baseline dietary intake pattern . After review baseline food record , subject instruct avoid berry product throughout study follow strictly limit polyphenolic diet 3 day prior study visit , maintain usual diet pattern physical activity . Prior 10-hr study visit , dinner meal provide day study visit control second meal effect food beverage intake night study visit . Subject arrive study visit fast least 10 hour , well hydrate rest . Each study visit require blood draw throughout visit . After pre-study procedure ( height , weight , waist circumference , vital sign , blood glucose measurement ) , register nurse place catheter subject 's arm purpose multiple blood sample collection take initial blood draw fasting . Thereafter , blood sample collection occur every 1 hour next 10 hour . During 10-hr study visit , subject drink one 3 identical placebo drink fast ( right fast blood draw ) , 2nd placebo drink breakfast meal ( 2 hr fast blood draw ) 3rd placebo drink 2 hour breakfast meal ( 4 hr fast blood draw ) . Premenopausal female subject study follicular phase menstrual cycle food intake tends stable follicular phase ( day 1-13 ) luteal phase ( day 14-28 ) rise progesterone level decrease satiety often result increase intake .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old Body Mass Index ( BMI ) range 25 29.9 kg/m2 ; exception BMI 23 27.4 kg/m2 Asian population Nonsmoker No clinical evidence cardiovascular , metabolic , respiratory , renal , gastrointestinal hepatic disease Not take medication would interfere outcomes study , i.e . lipid lower medication , antiinflammatory drug , dietary supplement . Able provide inform consent Able comply perform procedure request protocol Weight stable : gain lose weight +/ 5 kg previous 3 month Men woman smoke Past smoker : abstinence minimum 2 year Men woman know suspected food intolerance , allergy hypersensitivity Men woman know have/diagnosed diabetes mellitus Men woman fast blood glucose concentration > 125mg/dL Men woman blood pressure > 140 mmHg/90 mmHg Men woman document vascular disease , e.g. , heart failure , myocardial infarction , stroke , angina , related surgery . Men woman cancer nonmelanoma skin cancer previous 5 year . Women know pregnant intend become pregnant course study Women lactate Taking medication dietary supplement may interfere outcome study ; e.g. , antioxidant supplement , antiinflammation , lipid lower medication . Subjects may choose go dietary supplement ( require 30 day washout ) . Men woman donate blood within 3 month screen visit blood donors/participants participation study result donate 1500 milliliter blood previous 12 month . Men woman vegan Substance ( alcohol drug ) abuse within last 2 year . Excessive coffee tea consumer ( > 4 cups/d ) Men woman excessive exercise regularly athlete Unstable weight : gain lose weight +/ 5 kg previous 3 month Women take hormonal contraceptive
